TopicTitle: 1.0.2 Linear RCS not working on docking panel

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, I wanted to check if some of you experience the same issue a I.

I Found that the linear RCS option on the docking panel is not working, if I set the panel on linear mode, it still work in rotation mode, as of now the only way I have to use linear is with unjkli keys, which at least for me is kind of anyoing.

Has anyone experience the same issue??

Mods installed:

mechJeb

docking port alignment

kerbal alarm clock

chatterer

KER

PlanetShine.

Thanks and have a great day!!

Hey, just would like to report that I have the same issue with at least two of my ships. Restarting the game does not help.

The only mod I'm running is Kerbal Engineer.
I too am having this issue. The only mod I have installed is MechJeb.

Do you mean when you click the buttons in the lower left hand part of the screen to switch from staging to docking mode the keyboard doesn't change? If so, that is not a bug--it's a new "feature" of 1.0. See http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/336-KSP-1-0-is-Released under "Controls" in the change log. If that's not what you mean, sorry.
